STYLE1_W36.question_text: Next, please think about the leadership styles of people in top positions in business and politics. In general, when it comes to their approach to leadership, do you think that

IMPROVE1_W36.question_text: How much, if anything, do you think having more women in top leadership positions in business and government would do to improve the quality of life for women?

IMPROVE2_W36.question_text: How much, if anything, do you think having more women in top leadership positions in business and government would do to improve the quality of life for men?

IMPROVE3_W36.question_text: How much, if anything, do you think having more women in top leadership positions in business and government would do to improve the quality of life for all Americans?

COLSPEECH_W36.question_text: Thinking again about colleges and universities which of the following do you think should be more important on college campuses these days?
